attributes.action: Abolish the John Lewis list and minister expenses for second homes and make all expenses transparent and subject to audit
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In an era when times are hard for most households, why should we continue to fund luxury goods for a SECOND home for the very people responsible for the state of the economy? The current rules are nothing short of sick!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
